_comment: Created by EFisher on 03/12/2015 13:06:42 using v2.7
title: Has the proportion of social care users who found it easy to access information changed?
analysis_commentary: The Care and Support white paper highlighted how important it is for people to access the right information and advice, to improve care and support. Here we look at what proportion of people who use social care services found it easy to find information about services. Again, data in 2014-15 cannot be compared to previous years. We find that in 2014-15, 74.5% of service users found it easy to access information about support while it was only 65.5% of carers
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Personal Adult Social Care Survey
